entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac-Saint-Jean
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
